Used daily by 500+ brilliant companies

Accelerate your path to closed deals with Relaso CRM.

Relaso offers a seamless all-in-one solution, enabling effortless customer data organization, efficient communication management, and relationship nurturing—all from an intuitive platform. Key features include:

Easy Integration

Seamlessly connect Relaso with your existing tools and platforms, ensuring a smooth workflow without disruption to your current processes.

Automated Workflows

Automate repetitive tasks to save valuable time, boosting efficiency and allowing you to focus on more important aspects of your business.

Customizable Dashboard

Personalize your dashboard to align with your specific workflow and business needs, allowing you to manage key insights and tasks more efficiently.

Advanced Analytics

Access in-depth reporting and analytics tools that offer powerful insights into your business performance, helping you make informed decisions.

Enhance your business efficiency with Relaso suite of products.

Whether you're looking to optimize customer relationship management (CRM), streamline operations, or enhance sales and support workflows, our products are designed for seamless integration and maximum efficiency.

Relaso CRM

A comprehensive platform for managing customer relationships, streamlining communication, and enhancing business growth through advanced tools designed to improve efficiency, and customer satisfaction.

Relaso for Hospitech

A tailored solution for healthcare technology providers, enabling efficient patient management, streamlined workflows, and optimized operational performance within the healthcare sector.

Relaso for Clinics

Designed for clinics to manage patient appointments, streamline interactions, and improve overall service delivery, ensuring a seamless and efficient healthcare experience.

Relaso Sales

A powerful tool to enhance sales performance by tracking leads, managing customer interactions, and helping teams close deals faster and more effectively.

Relaso HelpDesk

A robust support system that simplifies customer inquiries, ticket management, and issue resolution, ensuring prompt and effective customer service.
